name: Warhead - Skull Knight Edition
detailed_description:
Become a Skull Knight and obliterate your enemies with the Undead Tower. Get 10 000 gold as a thank you for supporting Warhead! These are skins only, they do not alter the gameplay.

You'll get your money when you are in your Keep.
about_the_game:
Become a Skull Knight and obliterate your enemies with the Undead Tower. Get 10 000 gold as a thank you for supporting Warhead! These are skins only, they do not alter the gameplay.

You'll get your money when you are in your Keep.
short_description: Skull Knight and Undead Tower skin and 10 000 gold!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
